caption.title: Full Title: National highways map of the United States showing one hundred fifty thousand miles of national highways proposed by the National Highways Association
caption.text: Created in 1918 by: John C. Mulford, chief cartographer ; G.E. Lombard, J.M. Darley, E.E. Jenkins, cartographers. Published under direction of the National Highways Association.

caption.title: Patriotic and Persuasive
caption.text: The map uses a color scheme of red, white, and blue, the colors of the US flag, to evoke a sense of patriotism and duty in the viewer. The text implies that a national highway system will be a win for everyone, uniting even those with opposing views of the war.
A caption doesn't need a title; only the text is required. **Markdown** _is also_ supported, and we can [insert links](https://leventhalmap.org)

caption.title: Jumping to a new image in the same Manifest
caption.text: Now we've jumped over to another image from the same Manifest.
And now we're panning around that image. You can pan around as much as you like, at any zoom level.
